item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 电动汽车需求强劲，中国新鹏预计季度收入翻番
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏汽车周二预测，尽管经济形势严峻，但该公司第三季度的收入将翻一番，并押注于汽车交付量的激增。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng on Tuesday forecast third-quarter revenue would double, betting on surging deliveries of its cars despite challenging economic conditions.】

item.title: 瑞士刀具制造商考虑转移生产以缓解美国关税
item.description: 瑞士军刀制造商 Victorinox 公司首席执行官告诉《Wirtschaftswoche》商业杂志，该公司正在考虑将部分生产转移到美国，以减少进口关税对其业务的影响。【原文：Victorinox, maker of Swiss army knives, is considering moving part of its production to the United States to lessen the impact of import tariffs on its business, the company's CEO told the Wirtschaftswoche business magazine.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税让黑人美容企业岌岌可危
item.description: 今年夏初，34 岁的达吉亚-布莱克谢尔-卡洛维开始注意到，她的老客户不再像以前那样经常光顾她的美发沙龙了。【原文：Earlier this summer, Dajiah Blackshear-Calloway, 34, started to notice that her regular clients weren't visiting her hair salon as often as they used to.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国爱奇艺为在香港二次上市向银行申请高达 3 亿美元的资金
item.description: 两位知情人士称，中国视频流媒体平台爱奇艺已邀请美国银行、中金公司和摩根大通为其在香港的第二次上市工作提供服务，这次上市可能会融资 2 亿至 3 亿美元。【原文：Chinese video streaming platform iQIYI has tapped Bank of America, CICC and JPMorgan to work on its Hong Kong second listing that could raise between $200 million and $300 million, said two people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的利率要求让 "财政主导权 "成为市场焦点
item.description: 随着美国债务的膨胀和白宫对美联储降息的倚重，投资者正在权衡 "财政主导 "的风险。【原文：As U.S. debt swells and the White House leans on the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates, investors are weighing the risk of "fiscal dominance," a scenario where keeping government financing cheap eclipses the fight against inflation.】

item.title: 在人工智能热潮中，Databricks 最新融资估值超过 1000 亿美元
item.description: Databricks 周二表示，它正在筹集新的资金，这将使这家数据分析公司的估值超过 1,000 亿美元，这距离上一轮融资不到一年时间，因为投资者对人工智能公司的胃口依然强劲。【原文：Databricks said on Tuesday it was raising new funds that would value the data analytics firm at more than $100 billion, less than a year after its previous round, as investor appetite for artificial intelligence companies remains strong.】

item.title: 零售业盈利和美联储评论公布前，华尔街期货低迷
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走势低迷，投资者在等待主要零售商的财报，以了解美国消费者的健康状况，同时也在等待美联储定于本周晚些时候召开的重要会议。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Tuesday as investors awaited earnings reports from major retailers for insights on the health of the American consumer, and a key Federal Reserve conference scheduled later in the week.】

item.title: 大项目需求低迷，家得宝季度业绩不及预期
item.description: 本周二，家得宝公司（Home Depot）第二季度销售额和利润均未达到分析师预期，原因是注重价格的房主减少了大规模装修支出，转而专注于自己动手项目。【原文：Home Depot missed analysts' estimates for second-quarter sales and profit on Tuesday, as price-conscious homeowners reined in spending on large-scale renovations and focused on do-it-yourself projects.】

item.title: 路透社/益普索民意调查发现，美国人担心人工智能会永久取代工人的工作
item.description: 路透社/益普索（Reuters/Ipsos）的一项最新民意调查显示，美国人对人工智能的进步可能导致全国大部分地区永久性失业的前景深感忧虑。【原文：Americans are deeply concerned over the prospect that advances in artificial intelligence could put swaths of the country out of work permanently, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.】

item.title: 面对特朗普关税，印度虾农考虑转行
item.description: 在印度南部海岸，V. Srinivas 靠养殖对虾茁壮成长了二十年，印度也因此成为美国的顶级美食供应国。现在，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）50%的关税威胁正迫使许多人考虑其他赚钱方式。【原文：On India's southern coast, V. Srinivas thrived for two decades by farming shrimp, as the country became the top supplier of the delicacy to the United States. Now, Donald Trump's 50% tariff threat is forcing many to consider other ways of making money.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Elliott 大量入股后，美敦力将增加董事并成立委员会
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，在艾略特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）成为美敦力最大股东之一后，美敦力将增加两名新董事，并组建新的委员会。【原文：Medtronic will add two new directors and form new committees, after Elliott Investment Management became one of its largest shareholders, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受电动汽车订单推动，小米第二季度营收增长 30.5
item.description: 本周二，中国小米公司公布第二季度收入增长 30.5%，主要得益于其新型 YU7 电动 SUV 的强劲订单。【原文：China's Xiaomi reported a 30.5% jump in second-quarter revenue on Tuesday, helped by strong orders for its new YU7 electric SUV.】

item.title: 加航与空乘人员工会达成结束罢工的临时协议
item.description: 加拿大航空公司工会周二表示，该工会的空乘人员与加拿大最大的航空公司达成协议。【原文：Air Canada's unionized flight attendants reached an agreement with the country's largest carrier, the union said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国 "Pop Mart"（拉布娃娃制造商）称上半年收入增长三倍
item.description: 本周二，中国的流行玛特公司（Pop Mart）公布了上半年收入增长 204.4%的报告，原因是玩具需求旺盛，而且该公司正转向利润率更高的海外市场。【原文：China's Pop Mart , which has taken the world by storm with its smash hit, the ugly-cute Labubu doll, reported a 204.4% jump in first half revenue on Tuesday on high demand for the toys, and as it shifts towards higher-margin overseas markets.】

item.title: 日本初创公司将发行首个日元挂钩的稳定币
item.description: 日本初创公司 JPYC 表示，在本周获得许可证后，它将在今年晚些时候发行首个与日元挂钩的稳定币。【原文：Japanese startup JPYC said it will issue the first stablecoin pegged to the yen later in the year after receiving a licence this week.】

item.title: 软银孙正义支持盟友陈天桥，投资英特尔 20 亿美元
item.description: 2022 年，当陈立武从软银集团董事会卸任时，这家日本公司正面临投资失利的困境，他在临别赠言中就孙正义的企业集团如何加强业务提出了建议。【原文：When Lip-Bu Tan stepped down from the SoftBank Group board in 2022 at a time when the Japanese company was grappling with soured investments, his parting message offered advice on how Masayoshi Son's conglomerate could strengthen its business.】

item.title: DoorDash 收购 Deliveroo 的计划将根据欧盟简化合并程序进行审查
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二的文件显示，美国送餐公司 DoorDash 计划斥资 39 亿美元收购 Deliveroo，将根据欧盟简化合并程序进行审查。【原文：The planned $3.9 billion takeover of Deliveroo by U.S. meal delivery firm DoorDash will be reviewed under the European Union's simplified merger procedure, EU Commission documents showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 软银在人工智能和半导体资产上的赌注越来越大
item.description: 软银周二宣布向英特尔投资 20 亿美元，这将为这家日本科技投资者在人工智能和芯片行业的雄心赌注再添一笔。【原文：SoftBank announced on Tuesday a $2 billion investment in Intel that will add to the Japanese tech investor's ambitious bet on artificial intelligence and the chip industry.】

item.title: 中国联想将在沙特阿拉伯设立地区总部
item.description: 中国联想集团周二宣布计划在沙特阿拉伯设立地区总部，旨在加强其在中东市场的影响力。【原文：China's Lenovo Group announced plans on Tuesday to set up a regional headquarters in Saudi Arabia, aiming to strengthen its presence in the Middle East market.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称英伟达正在为中国研发性能超越 H20 的新型 AI 芯片
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，英伟达正在为中国开发一款基于其最新 Blackwell 架构的新人工智能芯片，其功能将比目前获准在中国销售的 H20 型号更强大。【原文：Nvidia is developing a new AI chip for China based on its latest Blackwell architecture that will be more powerful than the H20 model it is currently allowed to sell there, two people briefed on the matter said.】

item.title: 中国打击产能过剩的试金石是太阳能行业
item.description: 中国抑制工业产能过剩的努力在负债累累、臃肿不堪的多晶硅行业面临首次考验，该行业是太阳能电池生产的关键环节。【原文：China's efforts to curb industrial overcapacity face their first test in the indebted and bloated polysilicon sector, a key cog in solar cell production, where analysts say it is easiest for Beijing to intervene but still difficult to succeed.】

item.title: 预计中国将维持基准贷款利率不变
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，尽管近期一系列经济数据表明中国经济可能会失去一些动力，但预计本周中国将连续第三个月保持8月份基准贷款利率不变。【原文：China is expected to keep benchmark lending rates unchanged for the third straight month in August this week, a Reuters survey showed, despite a string of recent economic data suggesting the economy might lose some momentum.】

item.title: 早间竞标西装革履与微笑定义乌克兰新会谈
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 资深议员河野：日本必须提高利率，整顿财政状况
item.description: 执政党资深议员河野太郎（Taro Kono）周二对路透社表示，日元疲软已推高通胀并给家庭带来痛苦，日本必须提高利率并理顺财政状况，以巩固日元。【原文：Japan must raise interest rates and get its fiscal house in order to strengthen a weak yen that has pushed up inflation and brought pain to households, veteran ruling party lawmaker Taro Kono told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 标普确认美国信用评级为 "AA+"，理由是关税收入
item.description: S&P Global周一确认了其对美国的 "AA+"信用评级，称美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对其他国家征收关税所带来的收入将抵消其最近的支出法案所带来的财政打击。【原文：S&P Global on Monday affirmed its 'AA+' credit rating on the U.S., saying the revenue from President Donald Trump's tariffs on other countries will offset the fiscal hit from his recent spending bill.】

item.title: 加航机舱乘务员罢工进入第四天，谈判重启
item.description: 加航空乘人员周二将罢工延长至第四天，尽管工会表示双方已恢复谈判，因为在繁忙的夏季旅行季节，数十万乘客的航班被取消。【原文：Air Canada flight attendants extended their strike into a fourth day on Tuesday, although the union said both sides had resumed talks as hundreds of thousands of passengers had flights canceled during the busy summer travel season.】

item.title: OpenAI 在印度推出最便宜的 ChatGPT 计划，售价 4.6 美元，以促进增长
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 周二推出了 ChatGPT Go，这是一款仅在印度销售的新订阅计划，每月售价 399 卢比（约合 4.57 美元），是目前最实惠的产品，该公司希望借此深化其在印度第二大市场的业务。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI on Tuesday launched ChatGPT Go, a new India-only subscription plan priced at 399 rupees ($4.57) per month, its most affordable offering yet, as the company looks to deepen its presence in its second-largest market.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：申银万国考虑迁往中国，为香港上市铺平道路
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引消息人士的话报道，快速时尚零售商Shein集团考虑将总部迁回中国，以争取北京当局批准其在香港上市的计划。【原文：Fast-fashion retailer Shein Group has considered relocating its headquarters back to China in an effort to gain Beijing authorities' approval for its planned Hong Kong IPO, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 美国间谍头目加巴德称英国同意放弃对苹果公司的 "后门 "授权
item.description: 美国国家情报局局长图尔西-加巴德（Tulsi Gabbard）周一表示，英国已同意放弃要求 iPhone 制造商苹果公司提供 "后门 "的要求，因为 "后门 "可以访问美国公民受保护的加密数据。【原文：U.S. Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said on Monday the UK had agreed to drop its mandate for iPhone maker Apple to provide a "back door" that would have enabled access to the protected encrypted data of American citizens.】
